page.title: 08Elton Guides
page.content: Twelve girls aged between eleven and sixteen belong to 1st Elton All Saints Guides which is held at Elton school. The two ladies who run guides come from Southwick and Alwalton.We go for walks down to the river and play rounders using neckerchiefs as posts. If we don't go out then somebody is usually doing a badge which is a test. We have three patrols Swallows,Robins and Kingfishers.The uniform is a blue skirt,blue shirt,a yellow neckerchief and a navy hat.We pay 25 pence subs which goes towards buying badges.We go to a guide meeting once a week on Tuesday from 6.30 to 8.00.Boys of eleven and over belong to the Boy Scouts movement but there is not a pack in Elton.
